ygData.subject: Re: classes and races
ygData.msgSnippet: yes, humans in general level faster then any other race.
ygData.messageBody:
yes, humans in general level faster then any other race.

schlaban yocksovik wrote:

> From: "schlaban yocksovik" <anonymaste@...>
>
> HI.
>
> I was wondering if anyone know what class is the fastest to advance levels
> in.
> I know erudites for example get less xp then other races.
> How about darkelves? they get more or less xp?
>
> And also, does the god you worship affect xp?
> I know it affects the overall diff, on the game but does it affect xp?
>
> Would be logical that if you decide to worship the prince of hate, wich will
> increase the game diff alot, you should get more xp, is this how it works?
>
> I know some of you dont want this info...so if anyone knows the answer,
> tag the mail with spoiler hehe
>
> thanx
>
> Vashi
